name: Parkour
description: Parkour is a runner game with tons of challenges. Try to run as far as possible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
